Snail



...in the café atrium. The zigzag in the background is the handrail to some stairs inside the building.
Taken Thursday, September 13, 2001, 05:05:28pm.  Original image size: 1200x1600, 883kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/200s @ F3.5, ISO 100, 222mm
